DOC.brief_summary: Clinical trial compare two health education program obese patient order achieve substantial beneficial weight loss , use mediterranean diet . Patients allocate two group , one receive education diet lifestyle , one plus cook lesson . The intervention period 6 month monthly visit phone email contact . An extension observation period two year also plan 6 month contact clinic , also phone email contact available .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Comparing Two Health Education Programs Obese Patients ( HEPO-TRIAL )
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility : obese patient attend center . Exclusion criterion : previous dietary anti-obesity drug treatment , previous bariatric surgery , eat disorder , desire short-term bariatric surgery , active neoplasia , end stage kidney liver disease , food allergy celiac disease . Sample Size : total 260 patient ( 130 patient group ) need α=0.05 1-ß=0.8 , reach difference 5 % weight loss group , maximum 30 % dropout . Intervention : structured health education program Mediterranean diet lifestyle change cook lesson monthly session , aid phone email contact induction phase 6 month , follow extension period 18 month . Control : strategy without cook lesson . Primary outcome : weight loss % Secondary outcome : reversal obesity associate comorbidities quality life .
